Ubuntu has held a <nowiki>[[UbuntuGlobalJam|Global Jam]]</nowiki> for the last few releases, and have scheduled one for the weekend of 1st - 3rd of April. We've participated in all of the previous ones, so we should do so this release cycle also!

=== Locations ===

==== East SF Bay ====
* When: Friday, April 1st. 10am to 5pm
* Where: Saxby's in Walnut Creek, <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/venues/327/detail/|1632 North Main Street]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/701/detail/|LoCo Directory Entry (we encourage you to RSVP)]]</nowiki>
* Photos: <nowiki>[[https://picasaweb.google.com/tuxwingsgroup/UbuntuGlobalJamSaxbysWC]]</nowiki>

==== Berkeley ====
* When: Sunday, April 3rd. noon - 3pm
* Where: Bobby G's Pizzeria in Berkeley <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/venues/21/detail/|2072 University Ave]]</nowiki>
* Focus: Testing and Bugs
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/808/detail/|LoCo Directory Entry (we encourage you to RSVP)]]</nowiki>
* Photos: <nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ubuntu-us-ca/sets/72157626431246510/]]</nowiki>
* Blog post: <nowiki>[[http://princessleia.com/journal/?p=4196]]</nowiki>
